review: I have the 2nd gen apple TV (its worth noting I've had it for 4 years and its still good as new). As far as I know its the same as this current model but projects in 720p not 1080p. When I first got the TV it was limited but It continuously gets better in time. HBO, Netflix, Showtime, FX, Hulu, etc. No it doesn't have Amazon but this is where the best part of the Apple TV comes in- airplay. Basically any content(music/video) you can play on your iphone/macbook(newer models)/ipad can be streamed to the TV with one click of a button. You can then lock your phone or continue to use it. This is the best quality. There are some shows I don't have access to for various reason but all I have to do is find it online somewhere (yes even from "sketchy" websites) and then stream it. If you have apple devices I would definitely recommend this over the others.
